definition: covering or applying simultaneously to a number of similar items or elements or groups, having the function of uniting a group of similar things
details:
adjective
- covering or applying simultaneously to a number of similar items or elements or groups
= example: covering or applying simultaneously to a number of similar items or elements or groups
noun
- having the function of uniting a group of similar things
= example: having the function of uniting a group of similar things
- a formation of military planes maintained over ground operations or targets
= example: a formation of military planes maintained over ground operations or targets
- a lightweight handheld collapsible canopy
